value:
$WmMPID_フレイヤ味方,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|These mortals gather in such large
numbers for a simple mock battle?
I will never understand them...$k$p$WmMPID_プルメリア味方,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|They believe the spoils go to the
victor, so they'll do anything to see
themselves come out on top.$k$p$WmMPID_スカビオサ味方,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|They are sure to be finished quickly,
so there is no need to exert yourself,
Lady Freyja. Plumeria and I are here.$k$p
